DESCRIPTION: A special, stackable relic that uses effects through cards. Can obtain it at the PeroroGoods shop.
Take X cards from your discard pile into your hand, in the order in which they were discarded. When your discard pile is empty, draw cards equal to what is missing.
Start each combat with this card in your discard pile.
This card will not return from your discard pile to your draw pile even if your draw pile is empty.
There can only be one friend card with the same name in the deck.
If this card remains in your hand at the end of the turn, activate its effect and discard it. Targets are chosen randomly.
Temporary HP disappears at the end of combat.
